DOC.brief_summary: The SAVE Study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of the Venous Window Needle Guide in achieving access of a deep, un-cannulatable arteriovenous fistula to complete hemodialysis as prescribed.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of the Venous Window Needle Guide to Access Arteriovenous (AV)Fistulae
DOC.criteria: Deep, uncannulatable, upper extremity arteriovenous fistula Minimum arteriovenous fistula flow 400 ml/min One year life expectancy Nontransposed basilic or brachial vein arteriovenous fistula History of peripheral vascular disease History of cardiovascular disease History of cerebral vascular disease
